SE450: Implementing the Animation [40/41]

file:horstmann/ch04_animation/MoveableShape.java [source] [doc-public] [doc-private]
00001: package horstmann.ch04_animation;
00002: import java.awt.*;
00003: 
00004: /**
00005:    A shape that can be moved around.
00006: */
00007: public interface MoveableShape
00008: {
00009:    /**
00010:       Draws the shape.
00011:       @param g2 the graphics context
00012:    */
00013:    void draw(Graphics2D g2);
00014:    /**
00015:       Moves the shape by a given amount.
00016:       @param dx the amount to translate in x-direction
00017:       @param dy the amount to translate in y-direction
00018:    */
00019:    void translate(int dx, int dy);
00020: }
00021:

file:horstmann/ch04_animation/ShapeIcon.java [source] [doc-public] [doc-private]
00001: package horstmann.ch04_animation;
00002: import java.awt.*;
00003: import java.util.*;
00004: import javax.swing.*;
00005: 
00006: /**
00007:    An icon that contains a moveable shape.
00008: */
00009: public class ShapeIcon implements Icon
00010: {
00011:    public ShapeIcon(MoveableShape shape,
00012:       int width, int height)
00013:    {
00014:       this.shape = shape;
00015:       this.width = width;
00016:       this.height = height;
00017:    }
00018:    
00019:    public int getIconWidth()
00020:    {
00021:       return width;
00022:    }
00023: 
00024:    public int getIconHeight()
00025:    {
00026:       return height;
00027:    }
00028: 
00029:    public void paintIcon(Component c, Graphics g, int x, int y)
00030:    {
00031:       Graphics2D g2 = (Graphics2D) g;
00032:       shape.draw(g2);
00033:    }
00034: 
00035:    private int width;
00036:    private int height;
00037:    private MoveableShape shape;
00038: }
00039:

file:horstmann/ch04_animation/AnimationTester.java [source] [doc-public] [doc-private]
00001: package horstmann.ch04_animation;
00002: import java.awt.*;
00003: import java.awt.event.*;
00004: import javax.swing.*;
00005: 
00006: /**
00007:    This program implements an animation that moves
00008:    a car shape.
00009: */
00010: public class AnimationTester
00011: {
00012:    public static void main(String[] args)
00013:    {
00014:       JFrame frame = new JFrame();
00015: 
00016:       final MoveableShape shape
00017:             = new CarShape(0, 0, CAR_WIDTH);
00018: 
00019:       ShapeIcon icon = new ShapeIcon(shape,
00020:             ICON_WIDTH, ICON_HEIGHT);
00021: 
00022:       final JLabel label = new JLabel(icon);
00023:       frame.setLayout(new FlowLayout());
00024:       frame.add(label);
00025: 
00026:       frame.setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
00027:       frame.pack();
00028:       frame.setVisible(true);
00029: 
00030:       final int DELAY = 100;
00031:       // Milliseconds between timer ticks
00032:       Timer t = new Timer(DELAY, new
00033:          ActionListener()
00034:          {
00035:             public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent event)
00036:             {
00037:                shape.translate(1, 0);
00038:                label.repaint();
00039:             }
00040:          });
00041:       t.start();
00042:    }
00043: 
00044:    private static final int ICON_WIDTH = 400;
00045:    private static final int ICON_HEIGHT = 100;
00046:    private static final int CAR_WIDTH = 100;
00047: }
00048:

file:horstmann/ch04_animation/CarShape.java [source] [doc-public] [doc-private]
00001: package horstmann.ch04_animation;
00002: import java.awt.*;
00003: import java.awt.geom.*;
00004: import java.util.*;
00005: 
00006: /**
00007:    A car that can be moved around.
00008: */
00009: public class CarShape implements MoveableShape
00010: {
00011:    /**
00012:       Constructs a car item.
00013:       @param x the left of the bounding rectangle
00014:       @param y the top of the bounding rectangle
00015:       @param width the width of the bounding rectangle
00016:    */
00017:    public CarShape(int x, int y, int width)
00018:    {
00019:       this.x = x;
00020:       this.y = y;
00021:       this.width = width;
00022:    }
00023: 
00024:    public void translate(int dx, int dy)
00025:    {
00026:       x += dx;
00027:       y += dy;
00028:    }
00029: 
00030:    public void draw(Graphics2D g2)
00031:    {
00032:       Rectangle2D.Double body
00033:             = new Rectangle2D.Double(x, y + width / 6, 
00034:                   width - 1, width / 6);
00035:       Ellipse2D.Double frontTire
00036:             = new Ellipse2D.Double(x + width / 6, y + width / 3, 
00037:                   width / 6, width / 6);
00038:       Ellipse2D.Double rearTire
00039:             = new Ellipse2D.Double(x + width * 2 / 3, y + width / 3,
00040:                   width / 6, width / 6);
00041: 
00042:       // The bottom of the front windshield
00043:       Point2D.Double r1
00044:             = new Point2D.Double(x + width / 6, y + width / 6);
00045:       // The front of the roof
00046:       Point2D.Double r2
00047:             = new Point2D.Double(x + width / 3, y);
00048:       // The rear of the roof
00049:       Point2D.Double r3
00050:             = new Point2D.Double(x + width * 2 / 3, y);
00051:       // The bottom of the rear windshield
00052:       Point2D.Double r4
00053:             = new Point2D.Double(x + width * 5 / 6, y + width / 6);
00054:       Line2D.Double frontWindshield
00055:             = new Line2D.Double(r1, r2);
00056:       Line2D.Double roofTop
00057:             = new Line2D.Double(r2, r3);
00058:       Line2D.Double rearWindshield
00059:             = new Line2D.Double(r3, r4);
00060:       
00061:       g2.draw(body);
00062:       g2.draw(frontTire);
00063:       g2.draw(rearTire);
00064:       g2.draw(frontWindshield);
00065:       g2.draw(roofTop);
00066:       g2.draw(rearWindshield);
00067:    }
00068:    
00069:    private int x;
00070:    private int y;
00071:    private int width;
00072: }
00073:
